chaos 0.1.0
  • Reference

    A package with functions to generate fractals. It is intended to be use for educational purposes.

    Install

    To install chaos:

    devtools::install_github("ddiez/chaos")

    Usage

    library(chaos)
library(ggplot2)
x <- logmap(2, 4)
plot(x) + theme_void()

    Links

    • Report a bug at
      NA
